Organization based in.content:

Paragraph: The building from which Lee Harvey Oswald allegedly shot President Kennedy now contains county offices and , on the sixth floor , a museum with exhibits about the assassination ;

Here is the information in the requested Markdown table format:

| Organization | Location | Whether the Organization is based in the Location |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Museum with exhibits about the assassination | The building from which Lee Harvey Oswald allegedly shot President Kennedy | Yes |
